title: Fix garbage text appearing in test case titles

requirements.text: Update the backend test case generation logic in main.mo to ensure all test case titles are clean, descriptive, and meaningful without any garbage characters, placeholder text, or non-descriptive content
acceptanceCriteria: All generated test case titles contain only valid, readable text
Test case titles clearly describe what is being tested
No placeholder text, garbage characters, or corrupted strings appear in titles
Titles follow a consistent, professional naming convention

requirements.text: Verify that test case title generation produces semantically meaningful names that accurately reflect the test scenario based on the input requirements
acceptanceCriteria: Each test case title directly relates to its corresponding requirement
Titles are distinct and non-generic across different test cases
Title text is properly formatted without encoding issues

constraints: Do not change the existing test case generation categories (functional, boundary, edge, exploratory, positive, negative, orderedSequence)
Maintain backward compatibility with the existing TestSuite data structure
Keep all Motoko logic within the single main actor file
